item.title: Use your YAML fixtures as documentation
item.description:
If you are writing an API sandbox with a local development tool, you will no doubt need fixtures for your APIâ€™s modeling.

It turns out those fixtures are a great example of how your API is modeled. If you comment on those fixtures, they can be great documentation for the perusing developer.
